Uses of Class
ej.microui.io.AlphaNumericDisplayFont

Packages that use AlphaNumericDisplayFont
ej.microui.io   
 

Uses of AlphaNumericDisplayFont in ej.microui.io
 

Methods in ej.microui.io that return AlphaNumericDisplayFont
 AlphaNumericDisplayFont[] AlphaNumericDisplay.getAllFonts()
          Returns an array containing all available fonts in the AlphaNumericDisplay.
 AlphaNumericDisplayFont AlphaNumericDisplay.getDefaultFont()
          Returns the default font of the AlphaNumericDisplay.
This method may return null if no font is declared in the AlphaNumericDisplay.
 AlphaNumericDisplayFont AlphaNumericDisplay.getFont(int identifier, int style)
          Returns an AlphaNumericDisplayFont matching the requested characteristics as close as possible.

Font is requested with an identifier and style.
 

Methods in ej.microui.io with parameters of type AlphaNumericDisplayFont
 boolean AlphaNumericDisplay.setFont(AlphaNumericDisplayFont font)
          Set font as the current font.
